Headline: #49B North Western Temporary Southbound Reroute near Western/Leland
ShortDescription: Southbound 49B North Western  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Leland, Wilson and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Leland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #49B North Western  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Leland, Wilson and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Leland.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with delays in the Loop due to an earlier equipment problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with delays in the Loop due to an earlier equipment problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
